name: Mahjong Tours
description:
Prepare for a MAHJONG SOLITAIRE TRAVEL!
Get ready for the most popular mahjong solitaire quests in 2019! Explore an epic mix of original mahjong & exciting tours quests across cityscapes in the worldwide!
Play Mahjong Tours to explore the whole world! Hundred of tourist cities, thousands of famous places of interest and endless fun and interesting matching tiles games!

Mahjong Tours is a combination of creative mahjong solitaire, epic city journey and challenging quests, which can inspire your passion for brain & memory challenges.

※※※※Relax your brain while open your eyes!※※※※

WHY IS MAHJONG TOURS SO ADDICTIVE?
~ Over 500 free boards and more to come: FUN levels in a fantastic journey around the globe
~ Stunning scenery background: see famous attraction at home while playing Mahjong Solitaire Tour
~ Different difficulties: Fun for both children and adult, challenge in the endless tile matching adventures
~ Magic items and hidden tiles - challenging quests
~ Beautiful graphics and simple design
~ Intelligent free hints
~ Unique & beautiful layouts
~ Big mahjong tiles' graphics: EASY to PLAY & TAP
~ Claim your rewards in the treasure quest and find out rare tour puzzles

More highlights
~ New goals, power-ups and obstacles give mahyong a brand new twist
~ Play offline on your trips and flights
~ Perfect fit for solitaire, tripeaks, word search, puzzle and other smart games lovers
~ Free Original Mahjong gameplay with regular game updates
~ Player support

How to play
If you want to win, you need to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove all tiles to complete a board!
Win & unblock all the stunning tours puzzles!
Enjoy Mahjongg Tours and take yourself everywhere in the world!
